summary:
If you search a serious ENB, you can try this one...
True colors, no saturation, perfect shadow & light..... 
I worked 4  long days on this enb for get this result...
Deph of Field, Bloom enable.
Ambient occlusion disable.
descriptionHtml:
*****************************************************************************************************************************
Version 1.3 

-Better visual quality about texture(blur remake).
-rebalanced lenz effect
-sun light remake
-better shadow for realistic lightning

Uninstall realistic lightning on nexus if you have installed it. 
Version 1.3 use my version of realistic lightning.
 
If you use an other version of realistic lightning, your experience with this ENB can change totaly.

If you have a low configuration, try this in your ini files:

Skyrim.ini
iShadowMapResolutionPrimary=256

SkyrimPrefs.ini
iShadowMapResolutionSecondary=256
iShadowMapResolutionPrimary=512
iShadowMapResolution=1024

* Capture screen of 1.3 have been do with this option... 5-10fps gain.

i turn at
55-60 fps in town 
70-100 in cave/interior
38-55 in exterior

With a gtx580 and i7950@4200mhz.

*****************************************************************************************************************************
version 1.2 
-for better light lenz effect and reflect.
-Enb color, shadow will be improved for realistic lightning (for vanilla mod). 
 For installing realistic lightning, don\'t select dark dungeon or interior. 

*****************************************************************************************************************************
version 1.11
-Color palette updated for better color.
-old option who can make crach somes computer with crossfire video cards disable.
-optimization for better and same graphical result, gain of 10 to 25fps.
-Realistic lightning removed from data folder.
-Download actived for nexus manager
*****************************************************************************************************************************
Before to install,you must to be sure to delete/remove all files who can change color of the game.

Work with Realistic Lighting With Customization 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7654
unselect realistic lightning Patcher.esp in your manager nexus. make saturation color.


uninstall:
- all others files of enb
- All injector
And others Mods like imaginator.

For install it, YOU MUST FIRST!
Download ENB serie 119 source on the web site:
http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0119.htm

Download ENB whiteangel 1.3.rar file and Just extract it and copy files and folders in skyrim main folder.

in rar file:
The ENB documentation  of JawZ 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8005 


ENB files 
effect.txt
enbbloom.fx
enbeffect.fx
enbeffectprepass.fx
enbpalette.bmp
enbseries.ini
enbsunsprite.fx
enbsunsprite.tga

You can change the config of this enb in opening & editing the enbseries.ini file.

Important:
setting ForceFakeVideocard=false to true does nothing for AMD cards anymore, since 0.112 binary. No true performance gain anymore unless you are explicitly running a CrossFire setup with an AMD 4xxx series card. I troubleshoot CrossFire issues myself. 

ForceFakeVideocard=false for nvidia
ForceFakeVideocard=true for ati


For actived ambient occlusion:

[EFFECT]
EnableAmbientOcclusion=false to true

Important For get the correct color with your flat screem, up or down brigthness and gammacurve.

[COLORCORRECTION]
Brightness=0.85
GammaCurve=0.85
* try to up or down by 10 both at same time.


If you have a low or huge computer, you can reduce the quality of effet:

0 = high
1 = medium
2 = low

[SHADOW]
DetailedShadowQuality=0

[BLOOM]
Quality=0

This ENB use Realistic lighting and folder textures for the sun...
* if dungeon are too much dark for you, just disable realistic lightning mod.

* You can use nvidiainspector for edit profil config of skyrim for nvidia card. And use a negativ lod bias to -1.500. You juste to set to \"Allow\" the second parameter in \"negative lod bias\".
Visual quality is good like hd texture....

*IMPORTANT, if you have installled the realistic lightning with nexus or manually, be sure addon Realistic lightning - addon.esp is disable. Color are wrong with this option.
author: Langeblan
